definition: the content of a particular field of knowledge
details:
noun
- the content of a particular field of knowledge
= synonyms: knowledge domain
- people in general
= synonyms: world
- (mathematics) the set of values of the independent variable for which a function is defined
= synonyms: domain of a function
- territory over which rule or control is exercised
= example: territory over which rule or control is exercised
= synonyms: land
- a particular environment or walk of life
= synonyms: field
